{"products":[{"product_id":"gid://shopify/Product/8019017138291","title":"Sheep Socks Diana Red","description":"Product Details Classic unisex crew-length dress socks featuring Warm & Wonderful's iconic "Black Sheep" pattern Inspired by the original sweater famously worn by Princess Diana Cotton/polyester blend Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low Size & Fit Unisex. S/M fits women’s shoe sizes 4-9 and men’s 3-8; L/XL fits women’s shoe sizes 10+ and men’s 9+","image_url":"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0654/3749/9507/files/WW-SOCKS-SHEEP-FRONT_v3_714d4e2e-932e-46c9-8c90-45d5c5748803.jpg?v=1750235681","price_range":{"min":"18.0","max":"18.0","currency":"USD"},"product_type":"Socks","tags":["Accessories","CANAL25","Holiday24","New","RB Brand","Shop All","WFall24","WW24","WWF24"],"variants":[{"variant_id":"gid://shopify/ProductVariant/43137803944051","title":"Diana Red / XS/S","price":"18.0","currency":"USD","image_url":"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0654/3749/9507/files/WW-SOCKS-SHEEP-FRONT_v3_714d4e2e-932e-46c9-8c90-45d5c5748803.jpg?v=1750235681","available":true},{"variant_id":"gid://shopify/ProductVariant/43137803976819","title":"Diana Red / M/L","price":"18.0","currency":"USD","image_url":"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0654/3749/9507/files/WW-SOCKS-SHEEP-FRONT_v3_714d4e2e-932e-46c9-8c90-45d5c5748803.jpg?v=1750235681","available":true}]}],"pagination":{"hasNextPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false,"startCursor":"eyJwYWdlIjoxLCJsYXN0X2lkIjo4MDE5MDE3MTM4MjkxLCJyZXZlcnNlIjp0cnVlLCJvZmZzZXQiOjB9","endCursor":null,"currentPage":1,"nextPage":null,"maxPages":2500,"limitReached":false},"available_filters":[{"label":"Availability","values":{"label":["In stock","Out of stock"],"input_options":[{"label":"In stock","input":{"available":true}},{"label":"Out of stock","input":{"available":false}}]}},{"label":"Price","values":{"label":["Price"],"input_options":[{"label":"Price","input":{"price":{"min":0,"max":18.0}}}]}}],"instructions":"Use markdown to render product titles as links to their respective product pages using the URL property.

For product data:
- If variants are included in the response, those are the only variants available
- If variants are not included, use the options and availability matrix with get_product_details tool
- Check product_type, tags, and other properties to help the user find what they need

For filters:
- Mention available filters to the user if they might be helpful
- Use filters ONLY from available_filters in follow-up searches
- If a search term matches a filter, do a follow-up search with the filter applied

For pagination:
- Show only the first set of results initially
- If pagination.hasNextPage is true, ask if the user wants to see more
- Only fetch additional pages when explicitly requested
"}
